meanings.definition: To make a new master copy of (a recording) with the goal of improving the sound quality.
meanings.sent1: The audio engineer is remastering the old song to make it sound better.
meanings.sent2: They are remastering the classic album to enhance the audio quality.
meanings.sent3: The musician joked that remastering the track was like giving it a sonic makeover.
meanings.sent4: Remastering the song is like polishing a gem to reveal its true brilliance.
meanings.sent5: With remastering, the music becomes crystal clear and vibrant.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a new master copy of (a recording) to improve its quality.
meanings.sent1: The remastering of the album was a huge success among fans.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy listening to the remastering of old songs for better quality.
meanings.sent3: The remastering of the track turned it into a sonic masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her remastering of the song breathed new life into the music.
meanings.sent5: The remastering process brought out hidden details in the recording.
